effects: Increase resistance to Blind, Sleep, Paralyze, Confusion and Petrify by 25%

desc_short: Boost resistance against blind, sleep, paralysis, confusion, and stone
提高失明睡眠麻痺混亂石化耐性的數值

desc_long: Boosts blind, sleep, paralysis, confusion, and stone resistance.
提高失明睡眠麻痺混亂石化耐性的數值。
암흑, 수면, 마비, 혼란, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la résistance à cécité, sommeil., paralysie, confusion et pétrification.
Erhöht Resist. gegen Blenden, Schlaf, Lähmung, Konfus und Stein.
Aumenta la resistencia a ceguera, sueño, parálisis, confusión y piedra.
